thread.title: countrygirl
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by countrygirl

author: countrygirl
title: countrygirl
text: Very speedy and efficient service. Needed to change the jacket I had purchased for my husband as a Christmas present but this was all dealt with very quickly and he is delighted with the final choice.
